featured.text: Kareem had to fetch the water from a source that was a kilometer away.
Abdul Kareem, who used to be an airline ticketing agent, has a great love for the woods.
After years of hard work, Kareem has not only realized his dream but also transformed a piece of 39 property into a beautiful forest.
Kareem let his forest grow naturally, without using fertilizers or insecticides.
Greatly 37 by the result, Kareem planted more trees and his man-made forest began to take shape.

definition.zh_def: 一個常見的阿拉伯男性名字，意指慷慨或高貴。
definition.en_def: A common Arabic male name meaning generous or noble.
definition.example: Kareem is known for his kindness and generosity towards others.
